name: Trigger Fingers
description:
Instructions on how to play:

Unzip the file, and find the .exe file to run.

While in the cutscenes, it helps to not move or shoot.

WASD to move, left click to shoot.

If your player gets stuck in the boundaries, just jump (with the space key) and try to walk out of it.

Hints are in the top left-hand corner on what you need to do next.

After the ending cutscene, just close the game!

Thanks for playing!
